text: made spaghetti last night with jarred sauce but wish i made this instead <http://www.seriouseats.com/2016/10/how-to-make-quick-pressure-cooker-red-sauce.html>

attachments.title: Pressure Cooker Red Sauce: All-Day Flavor on a Weeknight Schedule
attachments.text: My slow-cooked tomato sauce isn't a bright, fresh tomato sauce. It's a rich, complex sauce that tastes like it cooked all day precisely because it did. But what if I don't have all day to cook my tomato sauce? What if it's six o'clock on a Wednesday night and I want to be in my pajamas and in bed, with a full belly and a content smile on my face, by eight? That's when I turn to the pressure cooker.
attachments.fallback: Pressure Cooker Red Sauce: All-Day Flavor on a Weeknight Schedule
